messages.subject: NSR - just raising funds...
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all - In the spirit of the holiday shopping season...I would like to get material for a moment and mention a few very nice swords that are for sale from my
messages.messageBody:
Hi all -

In the spirit of the holiday shopping season...I would like to get material for a moment and mention a few very nice swords that are for sale from my collection. I've placed four swords on consignment with Danny Massey. Check out www.nihontocraft.com and have a look. Swords are: nidai Tsuda Sukehiro, ko-Uda, Echizen Kanenori and a mumei Seki Kanenori.

I've asked Danny to lower prices on my things as a LIMITED TIME HOLIDAY SALE in hopes of stimulating some buying interest. Just trying to reimburse some sword funding folks. Take a look and maybe you'll be tempted to put another package under your tree!

Questions? All sword sales will go through Danny but I'm happy to answer any questions you might have regarding my items. Privately, off-list please at: swords@...

BOOKS - My intentions of working up an illustrated listing of a dozen or so titles I've got for sale has not yet materialize. However, if anyone is looking for something to add to their library, email me privately off-list and I'll at least send you my list of titles and prices. Of these titles, I still have ~20 copies of the Kokusai Tosogu Kai (KTK) 2008 4th International Convention publications available at $90 pp (U.S.) Books can be shipped in time for Christmas to a U.S. address. For a listing, email me OFF-LIST at: swords@...

Sorry for the lengthy marketing email but it gets the word out.

Ron
STL

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
